title: Hedgestone Group offers a variety of financial assets.
description: Hedgestone Group provides you with a variety of assets – stocks, commodities, currencies, or indices. It also ensures that you do not lose any trading opportunity.
keywords: Financial products, stocks, commodities, currencies, indices

content-body.text: Hedgestone provides you with direct access to a diverse set of financial instruments. Whether you are interested in trading stocks, commodities, currencies or indices, Hedgestone’s CFDs and options product enable you to seize new trading opportunities at the moment they emerge.
BHP, Microsoft, Apple and other blue chip, publicly-listed companies.
Crude oil, gold, corn and other raw building blocks of global industry.
EUR/USD, AUD/JPY, GBP/USD and other highly-liquid currency pairs.
NASDAQ, S&P 500, ASX 200 and other barometers of stock market performance.

Contracts-for-difference, or CFDs for short, are a type of financial instrument that enables you to speculate with respect to the future price movements of a range of underlying assets. For each CFD trade that you enter there is a broad range of possible payouts – the potential returns are open-ended.
CFDs enable you to enter trades that can yield positive returns when prices are rising and when they are falling.
Each CFD trade that you enter has a value that is directly linked to the price movements of an underlying asset.
Through the use of margin, CFDs enable you to enter positions which have a total value far greater than your capital outlay.

headline.title: Reasons to trade CFDs with Hedgestone

list-item.content: You want to trade primarily in instruments which are linked to the foreign exchange market
You want to use margin (i.e. leverage) to amplify your performance
You want to place trades which have an open-ended spectrum of payouts
You want to be able to generate positive returns in bullish and bearish market conditions

headline.title: Ready to learn more about CFDs?

content-body.text: Options are a type of financial instrument that enables traders to speculate with respect to the future price behavior of a range of underlying stocks, commodities, currencies and indices. Unlike CFDs, for each option trade that you enter the maximum potential payout is known at the outset.
The potential return and potential loss of an option is presented to you before you place the trade.
Options are settled at pre-determined expiry times – seconds, hours or weeks from the time you first enter a trade.
Within a short period of time, an option can yield exceptionally high net returns – sometimes higher than 90%.

headline.title: Reasons to trade options with Hedgestone

list-item.content: You want to speculate regarding the future prices of stocks, commodities, currencies and indices
You want to trade instruments which expire at a pre-determined time in the future
You want to know your maximum potential payout and maximum potential loss upfront
You want to earn high potential returns within very short timeframes

headline.title: Ready to learn more about options?
